member.name: D3D12_CULL_MODE
member.summary: Specifies triangles facing a particular direction are not drawn.

member.name: D3D12_CULL_MODE.D3D12_CULL_MODE_FRONT
member.summary: Do not draw triangles that are front-facing.

member.name: D3D12_CULL_MODE.D3D12_CULL_MODE_BACK
member.summary: Do not draw triangles that are back-facing.
